title: New Commander Keen webcomic.
content:
And NO I'm not doing this one.

As some may or may not know, I am on Deviant Art. (Not for long mind you. Just until this stupid subscription expires.) Well anyway I have set on my main page to display the 5 most recent visitors. (That is how I found most of the keeners who are on there.) Just now I logged on and saw that someone named "TheUniverseIsToast" who visited my site. Obviously interested I looked into the dude.

[url=http://theuniverseistoast.deviantart.com/]TheUniverseIsToast.deviantart.com/[/url]

Apparently he is starting a new webcomic called "The Universe is Toast." The story is set about 5 years after the events of Aliens Ate my Babysitter. (That's what is says on the site. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] )

The person doing this is trying to be somewhat anonymous but I figured out that the person who is making this is also the Deviant Art user Reanimashun. [url=http://reanimashun.deviantart.com/]Reanimashun.deviantart.com/[/url]
Reanimashun is or at least WAS working on another Commander Keen project but I don't know if he is still doing that.

Anyway thought you all might be interested. I'm keeping my eye on this. This will be what... the third Commander Keen related comic. (TMST's and mine are the only two that I can think of.) Personally I am very excited about this. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

Anyway you can all drop him a line at his AIM address at: nny138
Or on his deviant art page if you are signed up there.-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/New-blegd-smeeg-banner-60.png[/img][/url]

title: Woog.
content:
Stalker!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Sounds good. A new Keen webcoming is always a welcome event. Do keep us posted when something new happens. See if you can get Reanimashun to join the forums.

Woah, that sounds excellent! Can't wait to see some stuff! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] This is really cool..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: dA
content: You know you can still use deviantART without a paid subscription? Paying just gets you extra features, but the site itself is free to use. (I've never paid for it and don't intend to...)

title: Re: dA
content: rocketjess is correct I also have a DeviantART account(no submissions yet) and I have not had to pay anything to have it. You only need to pay if you want the extra features that suscription offers.

title: Re: dA
content:
I wouldn't have joined if i had to pay. I could just get my own website. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] -Genius314

"You have to pay to join and not get ads displayed on your page."

Are you talking about DA here? Because I have been a non-pay member there for almost two years and never encountered any serious space-taking ads. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
